references.paper_title: Flexible isosurface extraction for gradient-based mesh optimization
references.reason: This paper is foundational because SparseFlex builds upon FlexiCubes, providing accurate and differentiable isosurface extraction.

references.paper_title: Gvgen: Text-to-3d generation with volumetric representation
references.reason: This paper describes a text-to-3D generation technique using volumetric representation which is related to SparseFlex's use of sparse voxels and mesh generation.

references.paper_title: Structured 3d latents for scalable and versatile 3d generation
references.reason: This paper presents TELLIS which is used to develop the image-to-3D generation pipeline.

references.paper_title: Pointnet: Deep learning on point sets for 3d classification and segmentation
references.reason: This paper is important because SparseFlex employs a shallow PointNet to aggregate local geometric features within each voxel.
This paper is fundamental as SparseFlex VAE utilizes a variational autoencoder (VAE) to learn a compact and disentangled latent space of 3D shapes.
